QuestData.Title: Back to Billy
QuestData.Description: Here you go. And when you give this pie to that Billy, you tell him I hope he chokes on it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Pork Belly Pie to Billy Maclure at the Maclure Vineyards.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ugh... I'm starving! Do you have that pie for me, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Mm, yum! This pie is the best!$B$BI think my memory is coming back to me...
